channel.title: How to make my own forums?
channel.description: How do i make my own forums? for like the people for my server and stuff...?? please help thanks

item.title: How to make my own forums?
item.dc:creator: @dmac-is-blak dmac-is-blak
item.description:
@dmac-is-blak wrote:

ok i can help…first go to the server advertisement page…http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,50.0.htmlthen look at the blueheadline saying(subject/started by/replies/views/last post)and look right above it…it will say new topic,click that and use the layout as stated in the help thing that the moderators made to help players post…

your welcome…
need anymore help jsut ask

—d-dizzle

Read full topic
